Text: Thanks for the up.  Their sound is tight, but I wasn't aware that they are "Christian Metal-Core", so downloaders beware.  Judging by the list of other bands the studio has helped (ie Hatebreed & Chimaira), I didn't think they would be as preachy as they are.  But still, thanks for offering such a broad range of uploads...you are bookmarked and I check your ups daily.  Cheers!
Haha wow, How could You not know these guys were Christian??  And What does it matter? The Music is still Amazing.
